name: Ringan Batata Nu Shaak
description: An easy Indian dish with Eggplants and potatoes that is stir fried with spices, chickpea flour and nuts. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free
recipeIngredient: 8  small brinjals/small eggplants (cut into 4 pieces each)
1/2 tsp chilli powder or to taste
1/2 Tbsp peanut or almond powder (a little coarse or ground sunflower seeds if you want to avoid nuts.)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up the oil on a medium flame and add the mustard seeds
recipeInstructions.name: Heat up the oil on a medium flame and add the mustard seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Once the mustard seeds splutter, reduce the flame to low and then add in the hing, turmeric, chilli powder, coriander-cumin powder.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the mustard seeds splutter, reduce the flame to low and then add in the hing, turmeric, chilli powder, coriander-cumin powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well and cook for about a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well and cook for about a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the potatoes and mix well so that all the potatoes are covered with the masalas/spices.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the potatoes and mix well so that all the potatoes are covered with the masalas/spices.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the brinjals/eggplants and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the brinjals/eggplants and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook on low flame for about 1/2 hr or till the potatoes are done. The brinjals will become soft so no need to check if they're done. Stir once in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook on low flame for about 1/2 hr or till the potatoes are done. The brinjals will become soft so no need to check if they're done. Stir once in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpea flour and the peanut powder and mix well. Cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chickpea flour and the peanut powder and mix well. Cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the stove and add the cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn off the stove and add the cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with Roti/Chapati/Puri Indian flat bread and Daal.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with Roti/Chapati/Puri Indian flat bread and Daal.

recipeInstructions.text: This can be used later on as a stuffing inside a grilled sandwich with some onions, bell peppers, and Daiya cheese!
recipeInstructions.name: This can be used later on as a stuffing inside a grilled sandwich with some onions, bell peppers, and Daiya cheese!

keywords: eggplant, stir fried, vegan side dish
